greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,d) (n >= 1, 0 <= d <= 2n-2) = number of n X n integer-valued matrices M such that M_{1,1}=0, M_{n,n}=d, and M_{(i+1),j} = M_{i,j} + (0 or 1), M_{i,(j+1)} = M_{i,j} + (0 or 1).
reference: D. E. Knuth, Email to N. J. A. Sloane, Feb 06 2019.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..15, flattened
formula: The triangle is symmetric: T(n,d) = T(n,2n-2-d).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 07 2019
